observation.reason: The website makes claims of free and unusually low prices such as \Start trading Futures with us we are available anytime you want to initiate a trade\. The website also claims to be able to get an amount of money that is generally not possible such as \48.8% + INVESTMENT AFTER ONE MONTH\. The website also uses texts that target human psychological weaknesses such as \Do you want to compound your investment for a Higher profit value?\. The website also does not provide any information about the company such as its address or phone number. The website also handles different products from common e-commerce websites such as \Trading\ and \Investment\. The website also uses an inquiry phone number and email address that are not appropriate for business use such as \Allexcook11x@gmail.com\. The website also has a privacy policy that is ambiguous such as \We never charges any management administration or ticketing fees.\. The website also uses payment methods that are not common and are unusual such as \BTC/USDT\. The website also has not been updated in a long time such as the last update was in 2020.
